name: A Fox in Time
description:
The mechanic we chose for this Jam's theme was the Hat in Time Fox Mask. A Hat in Time is a 3D platformer where you play as "Hat Kid" and can use an assortment of hats to use different abilities. In a Hat in Time activating the Fox mask would make intangible and translucent blocks and walls become solid. So our team decided to remake this mechanic in a 2D environment.

Credits: Stefan Small, Dio Su, Nico Forero, and Daniel Cooper

Assets: SunnyLand by Ansimuz
